details.claim:
## The 128K Context Window: Rethinking What's Possible

Context window expansion from 8,000 to 128,000 tokens represents a 16x increase—and it fundamentally changes what's economically viable with LLMs.

verification.note: Requires manual verification and source citation

details.claim: To put this in perspective: 128,000 tokens can accommodate approximately 96,000 words, or about 350 pages of single-spaced text.

verification.note: Requires manual verification and source citation
